articles.description: With this year's unique circumstances, there are a lot of players whom teams haven't seen much of -- but what Nick Bitsko has shown scouts is eye-popping.
articles.content: The pitcher many scouts think has the highest upside in the 2020 MLB draft has been seen by most big league organizations for just three innings. And those innings were nearly a year ago, when he was… [+11875 chars]

articles.title: Heat's Udonis Haslem eager to help community, police work 'together' - ESPN
articles.description: Heat forward Udonis Haslem said on Sunday that he's "torn" amid the nationwide protests but that he's eager to help the community and police work together.
articles.content: Miami Heat forward Udonis Haslem said on Sunday that he's "torn" amid the nationwide protests following the death of a black man in Minnesota who was in police custody. But Haslem also said he's eage… [+2572 chars]

articles.title: Celtics player Enes Kanter joins Boston protest of George Floyd's death - WCVB Boston
articles.description: Standing nearly 7 feet tall, he was seen wearing his green jersey and chanting, "I can't breathe," in Boston Common.
articles.content:
BOSTON —A Boston Celtics basketball player joined thousands of demonstrators in the city who were protesting the death of George Floyd Sunday night.
